name: Noosa Flashpackers
description:
Welcome to Flashpackers Noosa - where the feel of a resort meets the social vibes of the hostel! 

The greatest part about travelling is making new friends to share your experiences with, so we focus on bringing our guests together with free social events every evening! Join us for SAUSAGE SIZZLES, NACHOâ€™S AND SANGRIA, MOVIE NIGHT, WINE AND CHEESE NIGHT and GAMES NIGHT! But wait thereâ€™s more - we have many other inclusions such as FREE Wi-Fi, FREE continental breakfast, FREE surfboard and bodyboard hire, FREE shuttle buses to the beach, FREE yoga mats and FREE tote bags. What more could you want!?

For our travellers we offer a combination of 6 private hotel style rooms, along with 4 and 6 bed privacy bunk rooms. Then there's our 10 bed shared rooms with two ensuites in each room. All rooms have air conditioning, and internal or attached ensuites. No need to walk to shared facilities in the middle of the night. Each bed has a hotel-grade mattress, double power point, reading light and bookshelf.  Comfort, clean, secure, and affordable with add-on value are important priorities at Flashpackers. "Our guests are always commenting - it is the cleanest hostel we have stayed at and rate us in the top 10 in the world!"  It's "Where Strangers become Friends".

Do you love to cook your own meals? Great! Because we have a first-class commercial kitchen that is jam-packed with various utensils, non-stick pans, oven, microwaves, stove tops, blender and sandwich press.
 
You will love our common areas. Kick back on our comfy couches and watch the big TV, laze in the reading room, or lounge around the poolside deck and soak up some Noosa sun in the privacy of the resort surrounds.

Your safety is our priority. The property is secured of an evening with locked gates, and we offer a locker for every guest in their room. For additional security, the property is monitored by CCTV surveillance cameras. We also have the Goki smart keys throughout the property which means your phone is your key. 

If you are arriving by a Greyhound or Premier bus then you're in luck â€“ our courtesy bus will pick you up and bring you to the hostel ðŸ˜Š

Conveniently located in the heart of Sunshine Beach, the hostel is a hop, skip and a jump from all the attractions that make the Noosa precinct so awesome. We are just a short stroll to both the beach, the Sunshine Beach Surf Club, and the Junction shops, we are right on the edge of the National Park. Noosa is the adventure destination playground; a place backpackers dream of coming to. Explore the famous Noosa National Park, surf beaches or the River on Gympie Terrace. Stroll through the popular Hastings Street strip or enjoy a coffee in the quaint Noosa Junction shopping precinct. Everyone wants to come to Noosa, and nobody wants to leave!

Reception opens at 8.00 am until 6:30 pm. However, guests may check in any time after 1.00 pm because of our new keyless entry. 

We look forward to having you stay with us!

houseRules.notes:
PAYMENT AND TERMS AT CHECK-IN AND CHECK-OUT

Reception opens from 8.00 am until 7.00 pm. Guests may check in any time after 1.00 pm.

Please advise if you wish to pay via direct debit or cash on arrival. A 2.5 % credit card surcharge applies to Mastercard and Visa and 3% for Amex. Payment for your booking is processed the day before arrival.

All bookings require a mobile number and email address to assist with the check-in process.

Check-in: 1.00 pm

Check-out: 10.00 am

The Goki Smart Key system allows for an automated Check-in after 1.00 pm completely contactless if you download your Goki app and sign up with your email address in advance to check-in. Your Smart Key to your Room will appear in your Goki app. Get Goki now and travel smarter and have fun with it.

CANCELLATION

Cancellations made within 48 hours of your check in date will be charged for 1 night per person.

No shows will be charged for the first night of your booking.

Change of dates will be considered subject to availability and you are to send your "Change of Date" via email to bookings@flashpackersnoosa.com. If a change of date is approved, you cannot change the date again.
Once a guest has checked in, there will be no refund for any nights of your booking should you wish to change your plans.

CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEAR BOOKINGS:

All bookings between 22nd December â€“ 5th January inclusive are subject to separate terms and conditions. Payments for bookings that fall on/between 22nd December â€“ 5th January inclusive will be processed immediately. Once payments are taken, there will be no refund given for cancellations. If we cannot take payment, we will attempt to contact you. If we do not have any correspondence within 24 hours, your reservation will be cancelled. You may choose to pay via direct debit or your nominated credit card provided at the time of booking will be charged.

EASTER BOOKINGS Easter is a minimum 3-night stay and payment will be taken 48 hours prior to your check-in. There is a no refund policy from 48 hours prior to the check-in date for your total booking.

Government Photo Identification is required upon check in (Passport or Drivers Licence).

Rates are subject to change due to active specials, peak/off peak seasons, and special events.

We are a non-smoking AND vaping facility. Smoking or Vaping inside the building will result in a cancellation of your booking. Smoking or Vaping in rooms will incur a deodoriser charge of minimum $100. No refund will be given. A designated Smoking and Vaping area are provided outside of the building. Noosa Flashpackers reserves the right to refuse entry to any person deemed by our staff as being disruptive to other guests and or staff. Guests will be asked to leave the premises with no refund given. Any incidental damages caused during your stay will be charged to the credit card given at the time of the booking. Noosa Flashpackers accepts no responsibility for the loss or damage of any personal belongings.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
